EasyP

Easy modern protobuf tooling for all your needs

Streamlining Protobuf Development

What is EasyP?
Quickstart
üßπ

Linter

Provides a linter that checks your protobuf files for errors and inconsistencies.

üì¶

Package Manager

Comes with a package manager that allows you to easily install and manage protobuf packages.

Code Generator

Generates code for you in a variety of languages, including Go, Java, and Python.

üö®

Breaking checks

Checks for breaking changes in your protobuf files and warns you before you deploy them.
